signals.detail: Pre-recorded message asking recipient to press 1 to speak to an agent
Caller claims to be from Social Security
Threatens to suspend SSN due to suspicious activity

audio_analysis.transcript_summary: Caller claims to be from Social Security, threatening to suspend SSN due to suspicious activity, and asking recipient to press 1 to know more.
audio_analysis.recommendation: Hang up. Do not press any buttons. Contact Social Security directly to verify the call.
